title: Language Education Design for Implementing PCK (Pedagogical Content Knowledge) Framework and Social Justice in Emergency Online Teaching (EOT)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and secondary education experience
context.additional_context: For in-service language teachers operating in PC-unavailable environments, this program delivers smartphone-based microlearning. Requires fostering a collaborative environment and self-directed learning to engage participants.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to build a collaborative online community of practice and propose three or more strategies for realizing social justice in educational settings
Learners will be able to create language lesson designs suitable for emergency online education scenarios by applying the PCK framework
Learners will be able to form sustainable learning habits by participating in peer feedback at least twice weekly using self-directed learning strategies in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
